#summary Usage instructions

= Usage =

Usage:
# The user underlines words which he want to translate on a page.
# Scans the page and treats it by OCR software which recognize underlined words. * I do not want to advertise any here.
# OCRed document shall be stored in html format.
# The program loads html files.
# Translation tree is fetched from a web dictionary.
# The user chooses proper translations from the tree, and adds them to the result list.
# Result list can be saved to txt files or in "Pytacz Master" format (http://pytacz-master.softonic.pl/)

Pytacz Master is a vocabulary learning software.

Now there is only Polish, English and German language.
